title: Fighting Attraction
description: Pointe Hope is on high alert! The attempted murders of Mylie Mier and her fianc√©, Professor Damien James, have rattled the town to its core, and the killer is still on the prowl. However, casanova Nik Mier refuses to face the reality that things are changing. Reeling from the shock of nearly losing his sister, Nik loses himself in the throes of passion with as many of the women as possible.Tomboy Ash Davenport is fleeing her past. Unable to stomach the fact that her reputation is tarnished, she aimlessly drifts across the country, and eventually ends up in the quiet southern town. While lying low, Ash's aggressiveness catches Nik's attention, but she wants him to see her as more than a sparring partner. Will she be able to drop the tomboy image, or should this spitfire tap out and move on before her past comes back to haunt them?Welcome to Pointe Hope, where Hope fortifies the soul and becomes a beacon in the darkest of times.
author: H.P. Landry
